price: Kandi rwose twahaye Musa igitabo (Tawurati) kugira ngo bayoboke.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
